alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 10:12PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN CHRISTIAN COUNTY THROUGH 1100 PM CDT... At 1012 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ozark, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Nixa, Ozark, Sparta, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Christian Center, Oldfield, Garrison, Chadwick, Linden, Selmore and Keltner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Missouri.
